ValidationRule.description: The Program Engagement Start Date must fall within the Program Start and End Dates when specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(StartDate__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Program__r.StartDate__c)), StartDate__c < Program__r.StartDate__c ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(StartDate__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Program__r.EndDate__c)), StartDate__c > Program__r.EndDate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select a start date that's on or after the program start date and on or before the program end date.
